identity.title: Rotating the Array Values to the Right by One Position

content.prompt: Construct a program that has a method that receives an array of values and returns the array rotated to the right by one position so that the value that is currently at the end of the array is moved to the front, shifting the remaining values to the right. For example, if the array is {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}, the program will change it to {6, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.
